TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaSet extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构的缓存。

span.span: Contains a cache of XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源或位置的架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 这样做会破坏代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 架构（包括内联架构）本质上容易受到拒绝服务攻击;不要在不受信任的情况下接受它们。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 架构验证错误消息和异常可能会向架构文件公开有关内容模型或 URI 路径的敏感信息。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 请注意不要向不受信任的调用方公开此信息。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. > - "安全注意事项" 部分中介绍了其他安全注意事项。Additional security considerations are covered in the "Security Considerations" section. 是可以存储 XML 架构定义语言（XSD）架构的缓存或库。 is a cache or library where you can store XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas. 通过将架构缓存在内存中，而不是从文件或 URL 访问架构，从而提高性能。 improves performance by caching schemas in memory instead of accessing them from a file or a URL. 每个架构都由命名空间 URI 和架构被添加到该集时指定的位置标识。Each schema is identified by the namespace URI and location that was specified when the schema was added to the set. 使用 属性可分配 XML 读取器用于数据验证的 对象。You use the property to assign the object an XML reader should use for data validation. ## 安全注意事项Security Considerations - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源的架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources. 这样做会破坏代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. 在架构的包含、导入和重新定义元素中引用的外部命名空间或位置是根据包含或导入这些元素的架构的基本 URI 解析的。External namespaces or locations referenced in include, import, and redefine elements of a schema are resolved with respect to the base URI of the schema that includes or imports them. 例如，如果包含或导入架构的基本 URI 为空或 `null`，则相对于当前目录解析外部位置。For example, if the base URI of the including or importing schema is empty or `null`, the external locations are resolved with respect to the current directory. 默认情况下， 类用于解析外部架构。The class is used to resolve external schemas by default. 若要对架构的 include、import 和 redefine 元素禁用解析，请将 属性设置为 `null`。To disable resolution of include, import, and redefine elements of a schema, set the property to `null`. - 类使用 类来分析和匹配 XML 架构中的正则表达式。The class uses the class to parse and match regular expressions in an XML schema. 在 XML 架构中使用正则表达式验证模式方面可能会涉及到增加的 CPU 使用率，并且应避免在高可用性方案中使用。Validation of pattern facets with regular expressions in an XML schema may involve increased CPU usage and should be avoided in high availability scenarios. - 由于使用 类而引发的异常，如 类可能包含不应在不受信任的方案中公开的敏感信息。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 例如， 的 属性返回导致此异常的架构文件的 URI 路径。For example, the property of an returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception. 不应在不受信任的方案中公开 属性。The property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 应正确处理异常，以便不受信任的情况下不公开此敏感信息。Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios. ## Examples 以下示例使用 中存储的架构验证 XML 文件。The following example validates an XML file using schemas stored in the . XML 文件 `urn:bookstore-schema` 中的命名空间标识 中要用于验证的架构。The namespace in the XML file, `urn:bookstore-schema`, identifies which schema in the to use for validation. 该示例的输出显示 XML 文件有两个架构冲突：Output from the example shows that the XML file has two schema violations: - 第一个 \ 元素包含一个 \ 元素，但没有 \<标题 > 或 \ 元素。The first \ element contains an \ element but no \ or \<price> element.</span></span> - <span data-ttu-id="7ac5b-129">最后一个 \<book > 元素中的 \<作者 > 元素缺少 \<的名字 >，\<> \<元素，而 > 元素的名称无效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ac5b-129">The \<author> element in the last \<book> element is missing a \<first-name> and \<last-name> element and instead has an invalid \<name> element.</span></span> [!code-cpp[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/CPP/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/CS/validschemaset.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/VB/validschemaset.vb#1)] ## <a name="input"></a><span data-ttu-id="7ac5b-130">输入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ac5b-130">Input</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7ac5b-131">示例使用下列两个输入文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ac5b-131">The sample uses the following two input files.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7ac5b-132">**booksSchemaFail：**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ac5b-132">**booksSchemaFail.xml:**</span></span> [!code-xml[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/XML/booksschemafail.xml#2)] <span data-ttu-id="7ac5b-133">**书籍 .xsd：**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7ac5b-133">**books.xsd:**</span></span> [!code-xml[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/XML/books.xsd#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 对象已存在于 中，则 方法不执行任何操作。If the object already exists in the , the method does nothing. 此方法的功能与 方法的功能相同。The functionality of this method is identical to that of the method.

summary.span: 将给定的 中的所有 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构添加到 。

span.span: Adds all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the given to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将架构添加到 之前，必须对其进行成功的预处理。Before a schema can be added to an , it has to be successfully preprocessed. 预处理执行以下基本任务。Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks. 1. 根据 W3C XML 架构的规则检查架构的结构有效性，但架构未完全验证。The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated. 2. 解析对内部和外部架构组件的引用。References to internal and external schema components are resolved. 已成功检索的任何导入或包含的架构也会添加到 中。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 导入的架构添加为单独的 对象，包含的架构构成包括 的一部分。Imported schemas are added as separate objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including . 如果要添加的 的 属性为 `true`，则将 中的所有架构添加到 中。If the property of the to add is `true`, all schemas in the to add are added to the . 如果要添加的 的 属性为 `false`，则添加的每个架构都将进行预处理。If the property of the to add is `false`, each schema added is preprocessed before being added. 如果新添加的 中的任何架构无法预处理，则不会添加任何架构;相反，会引发 。If any of the schemas in the newly added fails to be preprocessed, no schemas are added; instead, an is thrown. 因此，下面两个代码示例是不等效的。As a result, the following two code example are not equivalent. ```vb ' First example schemaSet.Add(schemaSet1) ' Second example Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema in schemaSet.Schemas() schemaSet.Add(schema) Next ``` ```csharp // First example schemaSet.Add(schemaSet1); // Second example foreach(XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas()) { schemaSet.Add(schema); } ``` 前面的两个代码示例并不是等效的。The previous two code examples are not equivalent. 在第一个示例中，如果 `schemaSet1` 中存在无效的架构，并且其 属性设置为 `false`，则不会将任何架构添加到 `schemaSet`中。In the first example, if an invalid schema exists in `schemaSet1` and its property is set to `false`, no schemas are added to `schemaSet`. 在第二个示例中，在遇到无效的架构之前，可以向 `schemaSet` 添加许多架构，并引发异常。In the second example, a number of schemas can be added to `schemaSet` before an invalid schema is encountered and an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将架构添加到 ，然后使用 方法将 添加到新的 。The following code example illustrates adding schemas to an , then adding the to a new using the method. ```vb Dim schemaSet1 As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/retail", "http://www.contoso.com/retail.xsd") schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/music", "http://www.contoso.com/music.xsd") Dim schemaSet2 As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet2.Add(schemaSet1) ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet1 = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/retail", "http://www.contoso.com/retail.xsd"); schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/music", "http://www.contoso.com/music.xsd"); XmlSchemaSet schemaSet2 = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet2.Add(schemaSet1); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将架构添加到 之前，必须对其进行成功的预处理。Before a schema can be added to an , it has to be successfully preprocessed. 预处理执行以下基本任务。Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks. 1. 根据 W3C XML 架构的规则检查架构的结构有效性，但架构未完全验证。The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated. 2. 解析对内部和外部架构组件的引用。References to internal and external schema components are resolved. 已成功检索的任何导入或包含的架构也会添加到 中。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 导入的架构添加为单独的 对象，包含的架构构成包括 的一部分。Imported schemas are added as separate objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including . 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 使用与架构相同的目标命名空间和架构位置 URL 将架构添加到 将返回原始架构对象。Adding a schema to the with the same target namespace and schema location URL as a schema already contained within the will return the original schema object. - 将新架构成功添加到 时， 的 属性设置为 `false`。When a new schema is successfully added to an , the property of the is set to `false`. - 调用 方法时，将解析 XML 架构中遇到的任何包含或导入元素。Any include or import elements encountered in an XML schema are resolved when the method is called. 如果无法解析 include 和 import 元素，则会导致架构验证警告，如果未为 对象指定 ，则不会报告这些警告。Failure to resolve include and import elements results in a schema validation warning and if no has been specified for the object, these warning will not be reported. - 如果将具有相同目标命名空间的架构添加 到 中已经存在的架构，则这两个架构都将添加。If a schema with the same target namespace as a schema that already exists in the is added to the , both schemas are added. > [!NOTE] > 此行为与过时的 对象不同。This behavior differs from the obsolete object. - 的 方法能够使用架构中定义的目标命名空间，而不需要在调用 方法时将目标命名空间指定为参数。The method of the has the ability to use the target namespace defined in a schema, rather than requiring the target namespace be specified as a parameter when the method is called. 在 方法的 `targetNamespace` 参数中指定 `null` 会指示 使用架构中定义的目标命名空间，如以下代码示例中所示。Specifying `null` in the `targetNamespace` parameter of the method instructs the to use the target namespace defined in the schema, as illustrated in the following code example. ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add(Nothing, "books.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema In schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books") schema.Write(Console.Out) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add(null, "books.xsd"); foreach(XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books")) { schema.Write(Console.Out); } ``` 在上面的代码示例中，`null` 指定为 方法的 `targetNamespace` 参数。In the code example above, `null` is specified as the `targetNamespace` parameter to the method. 因此，将使用 books.xml 文件中定义的 `targetNamespace`。As a result, the `targetNamespace` defined in the books.xml file is used. 在这种情况下，如果已将 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 指定为 `targetNamespace` 参数，则调用 方法的结果将相同。In this case, the result of calling the method would be identical if `http://www.contoso.com/books` had been specified as the `targetNamespace` parameter. - W3C XML 架构允许在定义了目标命名空间的架构中包含无目标命名空间的架构。W3C XML Schema allows schemas without a target namespace to be included in schemas with a target namespace defined. 在这种情况下，未定义目标命名空间的架构被强制转换为包含架构的目标命名空间。In this case, the schema without a target namespace defined is coerced into the target namespace of the including schema. 包含的架构被视为已定义该目标命名空间。The included schema is treated as if it had that target namespace defined. 同样，没有目标命名空间的架构可以添加到 并强制转换为 方法指定的目标命名空间，如以下示例中所示。Similarly, schemas without a target namespace can be added to the and coerced into the target namespace specified by the method, as illustrated in the following example. ``` ``` 如果上面的架构添加到目标命名空间为 `http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace` 的 （如以下代码所示），则将其视为 `http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace`架构中声明的目标命名空间。If the schema above is added to the with the target namespace `http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace` (as shown in the code below), it is treated as if the target namespace declared in the schema was `http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace`. ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace", "http://www.contoso.com/targetnamespace.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema in schemaSet.Schemas() Console.WriteLine(schema.TargetNamespace) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace", "http://www.contoso.com/targetnamespace.xsd"); foreach(XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas()) { Console.WriteLine(schema.TargetNamespace); } ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例将具有目标命名空间 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 的 `http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd` 架构添加到 。The following code example adds the `http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd` schema with a target namespace of `http://www.contoso.com/books` to the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); ``` 示例使用 `books.xsd` 文件作为输入。The example uses the `books.xsd` file as input. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/XML/books.xsd#3)]

span.span: Otherwise, an is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将架构添加到 之前，必须对其进行成功的预处理。Before a schema can be added to an , it has to be successfully preprocessed. 预处理执行以下基本任务。Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks. 1. 根据 W3C XML 架构的规则检查架构的结构有效性，但架构未完全验证。The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated. 2. 解析对内部和外部架构组件的引用。References to internal and external schema components are resolved. 已成功检索的任何导入或包含的架构也会添加到 中。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 导入的架构添加为单独的 对象，包含的架构构成包括 的一部分。Imported schemas are added as separate objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including . 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 已成功检索包含在 中的架构导入或包含的架构也会添加到 中。Successfully retrieved schemas imported or included by the schemas contained in the are also added to the . - 如果 未定位在根元素上，则将引发 ，除非当前项是一个元素。If the is not positioned on the root element, an is thrown unless the current item is an element. 如果当前项是 `xs:schema` 元素，则架构文档将读入 中;否则，会引发 ，因为架构无效。If the current item is an `xs:schema` element, the schema document is read into the ; otherwise, an is thrown because the schema is not valid. - 如果 位于一系列 XML 节点上，则只添加序列中的第一个节点。If the is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, only the first node in the sequence is added. - 如果从 方法调用创建了架构，则将忽略 属性的值，因为不会对 W3C XML 架构文档应用内联架构处理。If the schema was created from a method call, the value of the property is ignored, because inline schema processing is not applied for W3C XML Schema documents. - 的 属性不用于解析对 include 和 import 元素中的命名空间或架构位置的引用。The property of the is not used to resolve references to namespaces or schema locations in include and import elements. 而是使用 的 属性。Instead, the property of the is used. - 的 方法能够使用架构中定义的目标命名空间，而不需要在调用 方法时将目标命名空间指定为参数。The method of the has the ability to use the target namespace defined in a schema, rather than requiring the target namespace be specified as a parameter when the method is called. 指定 方法的 `null` 或 指示 使用架构中定义的目标命名空间。Specifying `null` or to the method instructs the to use the target namespace defined in the schema. 有关此行为的示例，请参阅 方法。For an example of this behavior, see the method. 此方法的其余功能与 方法相同。The remaining functionality of this method is identical to that of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将包含在 中的 books.xml 架构添加到 的 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 目标命名空间。The following code example adds the books.xsd schema contained in the with a target namespace of `http://www.contoso.com/books` to the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", New XmlTextReader("books.xsd") ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", new XmlTextReader("books.xsd"); ```

span.span: The schema is not valid.

exception.span: 作为参数传递的 对象为 。

span.span: The object passed as a parameter is .

summary.span: 获取或设置 的 。

The for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类为 指定唯一粒子归属（UPA）验证选项。The class specifies Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) validation options for the . 有关启用 UPA 验证检查的详细信息，请参阅 属性。For more information about enabling UPA validation checks, see the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Compile() cil managed

summary.span: 将添加到 的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构编译成一个逻辑架构。

span.span: Compiles the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas added to the into one logical schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要验证，并且以前未编译 ，例如，当 用作输入以便在 对象的 属性中创建 对象时，将自动调用此方法。This method is called automatically when validation is needed and the has not been previously compiled - for example, when an is used as an input to create an object in the property of an object. 如果 已经处于已编译状态，此方法将不会重新编译架构。If the is already in the compiled state, this method will not recompile the schemas. 如果此方法成功执行，则 属性设置为 `true`。If this method executes successfully, the property is set to `true`. 不会重新编译以前由 编译的架构。Schemas that have been previously compiled by an are not recompiled. 但是，将重新编译使用 的 方法编译的架构。However, schemas that were compiled using the method of the will be recompiled. > [!NOTE] > 如果在将架构添加到 后更改了该架构（或它的其中一个包含/导入），则需要调用 方法。You need to call the method if you have changed a schema (or one of its includes/imports) after adding it to the . 根据 W3C XML 架构的规则， 方法将检查架构的结构有效性。The method will check the schema for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema. 但是，它不会执行完全验证检查。However, it will not perform a full validation check. 它还将解析对内部和外部架构组件的引用。It will also resolve references to internal and external schema components. 已成功检索的任何导入或包含的架构也会添加到 中。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 导入的架构将作为单独的 对象添加，同时包含的架构将成为包括 的一部分。Imported schemas are added as separate objects while included schemas are made part of the including . 如果对重新处理的调用成功，则 属性设置为 false。If the call to reprocess is successful, the property is set to false. ## Examples ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") schemaSet.Compile() ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); schemaSet.Compile(); ```

exception.span: 当验证和编译 中的架构时发生错误。

span.span: An error occurred when validating and compiling the schemas in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 间接添加到 的架构由 方法检测;例如，导入的架构。Schemas that are indirectly added to the are detected by the method; for example, imported schemas. 因此，如果将 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 命名空间的架构导入 `http://www.contoso.com/retail` 命名空间的架构添加到 ，则使用 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 作为参数调用 时，它将返回 `true`。As a result, if a schema for the `http://www.contoso.com/retail` namespace which imports a schema for the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is added to the , calling with `http://www.contoso.com/books` as a parameter, it returns `true`.

summary.span: 获取 中逻辑 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构的数量。

span.span: Gets the number of logical XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the .
The number of logical schemas in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 中的命名空间 `http://www.contoso.com` 有两个架构， 属性将返回1，因为架构被视为用于验证目的的单个逻辑架构。If there are two schemas for the namespace `http://www.contoso.com` in the , the property would return 1 because the schemas are treated as a single logical schema for validation purposes. 但是，如果命名空间的架构 `http://www.contoso.com/retail` 导入 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 命名空间的架构，则 属性的值将为2。However, if a schema for the namespace `http://www.contoso.com/retail` imported a schema for the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace, the value of the property would be 2.

span.span: if the schemas in the have been compiled since the last time a schema was added or removed from the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果架构在 中编辑， 属性不受影响。The property is not affected if schemas are edited while in the . 不跟踪对 中各个架构的更新。Updates of the individual schemas in the are not tracked. 因此，只要 中没有添加或移除任何架构，即使 `true` 中包含的一个架构已更改， 属性也可以为 。As a result, the property can be `true` even though one of the schemas contained in the has been altered, as long as no schemas were added or removed from the . ## Examples 有关 属性的示例，请参阅 方法。For an example of the property, see the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema Reprocess(class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema schema) cil managed
Public Function Reprocess (schema As XmlSchema) As XmlSchema

span.span: The schema to reprocess.

summary.span: 重新处理已经存在于 中的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。

span.span: Reprocesses an XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema that already exists in the .

returns.span: 如果架构有效，则为 对象。

span.span: An object if the schema is a valid schema.

returns.span: 如果架构无效且指定了 ，则将返回 并引发适当的验证事件。

span.span: If the schema is not valid and a is specified, is returned and the appropriate validation event is raised.

returns.span: 否则会引发 。

span.span: Otherwise, an is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新处理架构将执行调用 方法时对架构执行的所有预处理步骤。Reprocessing a schema performs all the preprocessing steps performed on a schema when the method is called. 如果对 的调用成功，则 属性设置为 `false`。If the call to is successful, the property is set to `false`. 重新处理方法应在 中的架构被修改之后，在 执行编译后使用。The Reprocess method should be used after a schema in the has been modified, after the has performed compilation. > [!NOTE] > 如果在将架构添加到 后更改了该架构（或它的其中一个包含/导入），则需要调用 方法。You need to call the method if you have changed a schema (or one of its includes/imports) after adding it to the . 根据 W3C XML 架构的规则， 方法将检查架构的结构有效性。The method will check the schema for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema. 但是，它不会执行完全验证检查。However, it will not perform a full validation check. 它还将解析对内部和外部架构组件的引用。It will also resolve references to internal and external schema components. 已成功检索的任何导入或包含的架构也会添加到 中。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 导入的架构将作为单独的 对象添加，同时包含的架构将成为包括 的一部分。Imported schemas are added as separate objects while included schemas are made part of the including . 如果对重新处理的调用成功，则 属性设置为 false。If the call to reprocess is successful, the property is set to false. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重新处理添加到 的架构。The following example illustrates reprocessing a schema added to the . 使用 方法编译 ，并修改添加到 的架构后，即使 `true`中的架构已修改， 属性也将设置为 。After the is compiled using the method, and the schema added to the is modified, the property will be set to `true`, even though a schema in the has been modified. 调用 方法将执行 方法执行的所有预处理，并将 属性设置为 `false`。Calling the method performs all the preprocessing performed by the method and sets the property to `false`. ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() Dim schema As XmlSchema = schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") schemaSet.Compile() Dim element As XmlSchemaElement = New XmlSchemaElement() schema.Items.Add(element) element.Name = "book" element.SchemaTypeName = New XmlQualifiedName("string", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema") schemaSet.Reprocess(schema) ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); XmlSchema schema = schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); schemaSet.Compile(); XmlSchemaElement element = new XmlSchemaElement(); schema.Items.Add(element); element.Name = "book"; element.SchemaTypeName = new XmlQualifiedName("string", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"); schemaSet.Reprocess(schema); ```

span.span: The schema is not valid.

span.span: Returns a collection of XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ICollection Schemas() cil managed

summary.span: 返回 中所有 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the .

returns.span: 对象，它包含已添加到 中的所有架构。

span.span: An object containing all the schemas that have been added to the .

returns.span: 如果没有架构添加到 ，则返回空的 对象。

span.span: If no schemas have been added to the , an empty object is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回由于导入而间接添加到 中的架构。This method returns schemas that were added indirectly to the because they were imported. > [!NOTE] > 方法等效于过时 的 方法。The method is the equivalent of the method of the obsolete . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问 中的所有架构。The following example illustrates how to iterate over all the schemas in the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema In schemaSet.Schemas() schema.Write(Console.Out) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); foreach (XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas()) { schema.Write(Console.Out); } ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ICollection Schemas(string targetNamespace) cil managed
Public Function Schemas (targetNamespace As String) As ICollection

span.span: The schema property.

summary.span: 返回 中属于给定命名空间的所有 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the that belong to the given namespace.

returns.span: 对象，它包含已添加到 的中的属于给定命名空间的所有架构。

span.span: An object containing all the schemas that have been added to the that belong to the given namespace.

returns.span: 如果没有架构添加到 ，则返回空的 对象。

span.span: If no schemas have been added to the , an empty object is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `targetNamespace` 参数 `null` 或 ，则返回没有命名空间的所有架构。If the `targetNamespace` parameter is `null` or , then all schemas without a namespace are returned. 此方法返回由于导入而间接添加到 中的架构。This method returns schemas that were added indirectly to the because they were imported. > [!NOTE] > 方法等效于过时 的 方法。The method is the equivalent of the method of the obsolete . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 中循环访问 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 命名空间中的所有架构。The following example illustrates how to iterate over all the schemas in the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace in the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema In schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books") schema.Write(Console.Out) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); foreach (XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books")) { schema.Write(Console.Out); } ```

summary.span: 指定一个事件处理程序，用于接收有关 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构验证错误的信息。

span.span: Specifies an event handler for receiving information about XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置一个事件处理程序，用于在调用 的 或 方法时接收有关架构验证错误的信息。Sets an event handler for receiving information about schema validation errors when the or methods of the are called. 如果未定义事件处理程序，则将在 的任何验证错误上引发 。If an event handler is not defined, an is thrown on any validation errors where the is . 对于 为 的验证错误，不会引发异常。Exceptions are not thrown for validation errors with an of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加一个 ，以便在根据架构验证 XML 文档时捕获错误和警告。The following code example illustrates adding a to capture errors and warnings when validating an XML document against a schema. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/CPP/xmlschemasetexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/CS/xmlschemasetexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/VB/xmlschemasetexample.vb#1)] 该示例使用 books.xml 文件作为输入。The example uses the books.xml file as an input. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/XML/books.xml#2)] 该示例使用 books.xml 文件作为输入。The example uses the books.xsd file as an input. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/XML/books.xsd#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ XmlResolver { void set(System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ value); };

summary.span: 设置用于解析在架构的包含和导入元素中引用的命名空间或位置的 。

span.span: Sets the used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema.

value.span: ，用于解析在架构的包含和导入元素中引用的命名空间或位置。

span.span: The used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的 用于解析在架构的包含和导入元素中引用的命名空间或位置，无论何时使用 或 方法添加架构。The of an is used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema, any time a schema is added using the or methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在架构的包含、导入和重新定义元素中引用的外部命名空间或位置是根据包含或导入这些元素的架构的基本 URI 解析的。External namespaces or locations referenced in include, import, and redefine elements of a schema are resolved with respect to the base URI of the schema that includes or imports them. 例如，如果包含或导入架构的基本 URI 为空或 `null`，则相对于当前目录解析外部位置。For example, if the base URI of the including or importing schema is empty or `null`, the external locations are resolved with respect to the current directory. 默认情况下， 类用于解析外部架构。The class is used to resolve external schemas by default. 若要对架构的 include、import 和 redefine 元素禁用解析，请将 属性设置为 `null`。To disable resolution of include, import, and redefine elements of a schema, set the property to `null`.
